docs.snippet: Two Bundesliga clubs, Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich, appear headed for the first all-German final in the UEFA Champions League....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two Bundesliga clubs, Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich, appear headed for the first all-German final in the UEFA Champions League.
docs.abstract: Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich appear headed for the first all-German final in soccer's UEFA Champions League; dominant form and agile playmaking of the German teams comes as a surprise to many viewers, but for those paying attention to the developments in Europe's largest economy, it is anything but.

headline.seo: Germany’s Champions League Dominance Is Peak of a Long Climb Back
headline.main: Germans’ Dominance Is Peak of a Long Climb
headline.print_headline: Germans’ Dominance Is Peak of a Long Climb

docs.snippet: For years there has been a perception that Tottenham Hotspur of the Premier League is a so-called Jewish club in London. But the true Jewish team plays a lower league in Barnet....
docs.lead_paragraph: For years there has been a perception that Tottenham Hotspur of the Premier League is a so-called Jewish club in London. But the true Jewish team plays a lower league in Barnet.
docs.abstract: Profile of London Lions, who compete in 10th level of English soccer's 24-tier system; by rule, all players on each of the club's numerous teams must be Jewish.

headline.seo: Lions of Judah, and of London: A Jewish Soccer Team Plays When Saturday Comes
headline.main: London Team Is Built on One Religion but Has Evolving Identity

docs.snippet: A weekly show that calls games in Punjabi has married Canada’s pastime with the sounds of the Indian subcontinent, offering a glimpse at the changing face of hockey....
docs.lead_paragraph: A weekly show that calls games in Punjabi has married Canada’s pastime with the sounds of the Indian subcontinent, offering a glimpse at the changing face of hockey.
docs.abstract: Weekly Punjabi broadcast of Hockey Night in Canada on CBC marries Canada's national pastime with sounds of the Indian subcontinent, offering a glimpse at the changing face of hockey; broadcaster Harnarayan Singh has developed a signature style tailored for his rapidly expanding audience; is thought to be only NHL game called in language other than French or English.

headline.seo: A Punjabi Show Draws New Hockey Fans
headline.main: A Punjabi Broadcast Draws In New Hockey Fans

docs.abstract: Peggy Orenstein article discusses reasons why women are still dying from breast cancer even though public relations has been successful in raising public awareness of the disease.

headline.main: Our Feel-Good War on Breast Cancer
